name: Gem Trek Publishing Columbia Icefield
description: Everthing you want to know about the Columbia Icefields in one convenient map. This comprehensive, user-friendly map and guide covers the Columbia Icefield, from walks and hikes to tours and exhibits. Popular trails on the map include Parker Ridge, Wilcox Pass and Nigel Pass. Includes answers to frequently asked questions, and information about history, geology, wildlife, and wildflowers.
